summary: Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio|David Thewlis|Romane Bohringer|Dominique Blanc|Félicie Pasotti|Nita Klein|James Thierrée|Emmanuelle Oppo|Denise Chalem|Andrzej Seweryn|Christopher Thompson|Bruce Van Barthold|Christopher Chaplin|Christopher Hampton|Mathias Jung|Kettly Noël|Cheb Han|Aza Declercq|Irmelin DiCaprio|Trine Thielen
title: Vidas al límite
